HotelElement.Name: Qualys Hotel Le Mas de Grille

Description.Text:
Hotel Le Mas de Grille is located in a quiet neighborhood and is 15 minutes away from the city center of Montpellier by tram. The property is equipped with an outdoor pool, a garden and a restaurant. You will also able to relax in their wellness center.
Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 50 accommodation units. Services and facilities at the hotel include wireless internet access, a dining area, a bar, a conference room and a business centre. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Rooms The establishment offers non-smoking rooms. In each accommodation unit, guests will find a safe, tea and coffee making equipment and wireless internet access. Sports/Entertainment Sport and leisure options are offered by the hotel and third-party operators. The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. Leisure options at the establishment also include a gym and a spa.
